original_text: But one of the soldiers pierced his side with a spear, and at once there came out blood and water.
korean_text: 그 중 한 군인이 창으로 옆구리를 찌르니 곧 피와 물이 나오더라

sentences.original_text: But one of the soldiers pierced his side with a spear
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 한 병사가 창으로 그의 옆구리를 찔렀습니다

sentences.original_text: and at once there came out blood and water
